assertions.A0000: The response arranges the draft slides task before review slides task in the plan
assertions.A0001: Each task in the plan should have a designated owner assigned
assertions.A0002: The plan includes specific start and end dates for each deliverable
assertions.A0003: The workback plan identifies all blocking dependencies between tasks
assertions.A0004: The response includes the meeting subject, date, time, and full attendee list
assertions.A0005: All artifacts and deliverables are clearly listed with expected formats
assertions.A0006: The plan includes progress review checkpoints at regular intervals
assertions.A0007: The plan identifies top risks and includes mitigation strategies with owners
